short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fastest Web Annotation Tool on Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AccessNotes is the ultimate tool for anyone looking to annotate, highlight, and organize web content effortlessly. As the most accessible web annotation tool available on Chrome, AccessNotes transforms how you interact with online information, making it easier than ever to capture and manage your notes.

Key Features:

Highlight and Annotate:

Easily highlight any text or selection on a webpage.
Add detailed notes to your highlights to capture your thoughts, ideas, or important information.

Organized File-Based System:

View all your annotations in a neatly organized file system by clicking on the AccessNotes icon.
Access your notes quickly and efficiently without losing track of your important information.

Seamless Navigation:

Click on the title of any annotation to be instantly taken back to the exact spot on the page where you made the highlight or note.
Never lose context or forget where you found your information.

User-Friendly Interface:

Intuitive and easy-to-use interface designed for a seamless user experience.
Perfect for students, researchers, professionals, and anyone who needs to annotate web content regularly.

Customizable Options:

Tailor your highlighting and annotation preferences to suit your needs.
Choose from various colors and styles to make your notes stand out.

Data Privacy:

You own your data. When making annotations, your data will be saved in your chrome local storage. That means that if you clear your browser history or cache, your annotations will be deleted as well.

If you would like async and persistent data, please contact me on my website.
